events.title: Inter-Varsity Debate Championship 2025
events.description: Join us for the annual inter-varsity debate championship featuring teams from universities across the region. This year's theme focuses on 'Digital Transformation in Education'.

events.title: Workshop: Advanced Argumentation Techniques
events.description: Learn advanced argumentation strategies and logical fallacies. Perfect for both beginners and experienced debaters looking to sharpen their skills.

events.title: Monthly Society Meeting
events.description: Monthly society meeting to discuss upcoming events, member feedback, and plan future activities. All members are encouraged to attend.

events.title: Debate Masterclass with Dr. Sarah Johnson
events.description: Special masterclass with renowned debate coach Dr. Sarah Johnson. Limited seats available. Registration required.
